Data.Name: 姓名
Data.Sql: select name from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 诊断
Data.Sql: select diag_name from fin_ipr_inmaininfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: EMR主诊断
Data.Sql: select MAIN_DIAGNOSE from pt_inpatient_cure where INPATIENT_CODE= '{0}'

Data.Name: 性别
Data.Sql: select sex_code from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 第几次入院
Data.Sql: select IN_TIMES from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 籍贯
Data.Sql: select dist from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 出生地
Data.Sql: select birth_area from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 户口地址邮编
Data.Sql: select HOME_ZIP from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 工作单位及地址邮编
Data.Sql: select WORK_ZIP from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 联系人关系
Data.Sql: select RELA_CODE from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 付费方式
Data.Sql: SELECT decode(t.PACT_CODE,'1','7','5','1','7','3','9') as PACT_CODE from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 健康卡号
Data.Sql: select CARD_NO from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 国籍
Data.Sql: select nvl(t.COUN_CODE,'中国') AS COUN_CODE from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 婚姻
Data.Sql: select nvl(decode(t.MARI,'W','3','S','1','2'),'1') AS MARI from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 入院途径
Data.Sql: select nvl(t.in_source,'2') as in_source from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 病人来源
Data.Sql: select nvl(t.in_avenue,'1') AS in_avenue from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 是否手术
Data.Sql: SELECT decode(count(1),0,'2','1') AS ISShouShu FROM gghis.MET_OPS_RECORD WHERE YNVALID='1' AND CLINIC_CODE='{0}'

Data.Name: 手术类型
Data.Sql: SELECT nvl(decode(ops_kind,'2','1','2'),'1') AS ops_kind FROM gghis.MET_OPS_RECORD WHERE YNVALID='1' AND CLINIC_CODE='{0}'

Data.Name: 入院科室
Data.Sql: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT a.OLD_DATA_CODE FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'B') IN ('3002') THEN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.NEW_DATA_NAME FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'RI' ORDER BY a.OPER_DATE asc) WHERE rownum = 1) ELSE (SELECT a.NEW_DATA_NAME FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'B') END DEPT FROM dual

Data.Name: 出院科室
Data.Sql: SELECT a.OLD_DATA_NAME FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'O' ORDER BY OPER_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 联系人地址
Data.Sql: select LINKMAN_ADD from vhis_inpatientinfo t where t.INPATIENT_NO='{0}'

Data.Name: 接诊时间
Data.Sql: SELECT T.OPER_DATE AS OPERDATE FROM VHIS_SHIFTDATA t WHERE t.INPATIENT_NO = '{0}' AND t.SHIFT_TYPE = 'ADMISSION' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 入院床号
Data.Sql: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT a.OLD_DATA_CODE FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'K') IN ('9101') THEN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(a.NEW_DATA_CODE,5,length(a.NEW_DATA_CODE)-4) FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'RB' AND SUBSTR(a.NEW_DATA_CODE,1,4) !='9101' ORDER BY a.OPER_DATE ASC) WHERE rownum = 1) ELSE (SELECT SUBSTR(a.NEW_DATA_CODE,5,length(a.NEW_DATA_CODE)-4) FROM GGHIS.COM_SHIFTDATA a WHERE a.CLINIC_NO = '{0}' AND a.SHIFT_TYPE = 'K') END DEPT FROM dual

Data.Name: 出院床号
Data.Sql: SELECT SUBSTR(a.BED_NO,5,length(a.BED_NO)-4) FROM GGHIS.FIN_IPR_INMAININFO a WHERE a.INPATIENT_NO = '{0}' AND a.IN_STATE IN('B', 'O') ORDER BY OPER_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 第一次体温
Data.Sql: select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='85' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1

Data.Name: 第一次脉搏
Data.Sql: select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='86' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1

Data.Name: 第一次呼吸
Data.Sql: select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='87' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1

Data.Name: 第一次血压
Data.Sql: select ( select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='90' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1) ||'/'|| ( select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.measure_value2) AS MEASURE_VALUE2 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='90' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1 ) as xueya from dual

Data.Name: 第一次血压高
Data.Sql: SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='90' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 第一次血压低
Data.Sql: SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE2) AS MEASURE_VALUE2 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='90' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 第一次身高
Data.Sql: SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='622' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS only

Data.Name: 第一次体重
Data.Sql: select * from ( SELECT to_char(a.MEASURE_VALUE1) AS MEASURE_VALUE1 FROM RCD_NURSE_RECORD_DATA a,PT_INPATIENT_CURE b WHERE a.INPATIENT_ID = b.ID AND b.INPATIENT_CODE = '{0}' AND a.NURSE_ITEM_ID='1002' ORDER BY a.MEASURE_TIME ASC ) where rownum =1

Data.Name: 门诊患者电话
Data.Sql: select reg.RELA_PHONE from emr.vhis_register reg where reg.CLINIC_CODE = '{0}'
